00005 {

00020 
00021 double* Grid1D::get_grid()
00022 {
00023  return (double*)&grid[0];
00024 }
00025 
00026 
00027 double Grid1D::get_grid_lin(double z0)
00028 {
00029   int j1, j2;
00030   double f1, f2;
00031   double dist0=z0-begin;
00032   j1=(int)floor(dist0/dz-0.5);
00033   j2=j1+1;
00034   f1=((j2+0.5)*dz-dist0)/dz;
00035   f2=(dist0-(j1+0.5)*dz)/dz;
00036   return this->operator[](j1)*f1
00037     + this->operator[](j2)*f2;
00038 }
00039 
00040 
00041 double Grid1D::get_grid_spline(double z0)
00042 {
00043   int j1, j2, j3;
00044   double f1, f2, f3;
00045   double dist0=z0-begin;
00046   j2=(int)floor(dist0/dz);
00047   j3=j2+1;
00048   j1=j2-1;
00049   f1=0.5*pow(1.5-fabs(dist0/dz-(j1+0.5)),2);
00050   f2=3.0/4.0-pow(dist0/dz-(j2+0.5),2);
00051   f3=0.5*pow(1.5-fabs(dist0/dz-(j3+0.5)),2);
00052   return this->operator[](j1)*f1
00053     + this->operator[](j2)*f2
00054     + this->operator[](j3)*f3;
00055 }

00058 void Grid1D::regrid(double diff, double beg)
00059 {
00060         int n=grid.size();
00061         dz=diff; 
00062         begin=beg; 
00063         for(int j=0; j<n; j++) 
00064               z[j]=begin+(j+0.5)*dz;
00065 }

00068 // returns field with periodic boundary conditions:
00069 
00070 
00071 double& Grid1D::operator[](int j)
00072 {
00073         int n = grid.size();
00074         if(j >= n)
00075                 return grid[j-n];
00076         else if( j < 0)
00077                 return grid[n+j];
00078         else return grid[j];
00079 }

00083 Grid1D& Grid1D::operator=(const Grid1D& g)
00084 {
00085         if ( this != &g )
00086         { 
00087                 grid=g.grid;  
00088                 dz=g.dz;
00089                 z=g.z;
00090                 begin=g.begin;
00091         }
00092         return *this;
00093 }

00122 void Grid1D::Pic2Field(double pic_quantity, double pic_pos)
00123 {
00124         int j1, j2, n = grid.size();
00125         double f1, f2;
00126         double dist0=pic_pos-begin;
00127         j1=(int)floor(dist0/dz-0.5);
00128         j2=j1+1;
00129         f1=((j2+0.5)*dz-dist0)/dz;
00130         f2=(dist0-(j1+0.5)*dz)/dz;
00131 
00132         this->operator[](j1) += pic_quantity*f1;
00133         this->operator[](j2) += pic_quantity*f2;
00134 
00135 }

00139 
00140 
00141 void Grid1D::Pic2FieldTSC(double pic_quantity, double pic_pos)
00142 {
00143         int j1, j2, j3, n = grid.size();
00144         double f1, f2, f3;
00145         double dist0=pic_pos-begin;
00146         j2=(int)floor(dist0/dz);
00147         j1=j2-1;
00148         j3=j2+1;
00149         double dist2=dist0-(j2+0.5)*dz;
00150         f1=0.5*pow(0.5-dist2/dz,2);
00151         f2=3.0/4.0-pow(dist2/dz,2);
00152         f3=0.5*pow(0.5+dist2/dz,2);
00153 
00154         this->operator[](j1) += pic_quantity*f1;
00155         this->operator[](j2) += pic_quantity*f2;
00156         this->operator[](j3) += pic_quantity*f3;
00157 
00158 }

00178 // smooth field:
00179 
00180 void Grid1D::smooth()
00181 {
00182         int j;
00183         vektor tem(grid);
00184         double alpha;
00185 
00186         alpha=0.5;
00187         for(j=1; j<grid.size()-1; j++)
00188                 grid[j]=(alpha*tem[j-1]+tem[j]+alpha*tem[j+1])/(1.0+2.0*alpha);
00189         j=0;
00190         grid[j]=(alpha*tem[grid.size()-1]+tem[j]+alpha*tem[j+1])/(1.0+2.0*alpha);
00191         j=grid.size()-1;
00192         grid[j]=(alpha*tem[j-1]+tem[j]+alpha*tem[0])/(1.0+2.0*alpha);
00193 }

00196 void Grid1D::print()
00197 {
00198  if (outfile.is_open()) 
00199  {
00200   int n=grid.size(); 
00201   float *tem=new float[n];
00202   for(int j=0; j<n; j++)
00203      tem[j]=grid[j];
00204   outfile.write((char*)tem,sizeof(float)*n); 
00205   outfile.flush();
00206   delete tem;  
00207  }
00208 }

00219 
00220 double Grid1D::get_max_abs()
00221 {
00222         double tem=0.0;
00223         for(int j=0; j<grid.size(); j++)
00224                 if( tem < fabs(grid[j]) ) tem=grid[j];
00225         return tem;
00226 }

00232 Grid2D::Grid2D(int dimx, int dimy, double diffx, double diffy, double begx, double begy) //: x(dimx), y(dimy)
00233 {
00234         x=vektor(dimx);
00235         y=vektor(dimy);
00236         NX=dimx;  
00237         NY=dimy;
00238         dx=diffx;
00239         dy=diffy;
00240         beginx=begx;
00241         beginy=begy;
00242         grid=new double[NX*NY];
00243         boundary=0.0;   
00244         for(int j=0; j<dimx; j++) x[j]=beginx+(j+0.5)*dx;
00245         for(int j=0; j<dimy; j++) y[j]=beginy+(j+0.5)*dy;
00246 }

00248 
00249 
00250 Grid2D::Grid2D(int dimx, int dimy, double diffx, double diffy) : x(dimx), y(dimy)
00251 {
00252         NX=dimx;  
00253         NY=dimy;
00254         dx=diffx;
00255         dy=diffy;
00256         beginx=-0.5*dimx*dx;
00257         beginy=-0.5*dimy*dy;
00258         grid=new double[NX*NY];
00259         boundary=0.0;   
00260         for(int j=0; j<dimx; j++) x[j]=beginx+(j+0.5)*dx;
00261         for(int j=0; j<dimy; j++) y[j]=beginy+(j+0.5)*dy;
00262 }

00272         beginy=-0.5*dimy*dy;

00276         for(int j=0; j<dimy; j++) y[j]=beginy+(j+0.5)*dy;
00277         outfile.open(filename.c_str(),ios::out);

00292                 beginy=g.beginy;

00299 
00300 Grid2D& Grid2D::operator=(const Grid2D& g)
00301 {
00302         if ( this != &g )
00303         { 
00304                 if ( NX==0 && NY==0 )
00305                   grid=new double[g.NX*g.NY];
00306                 for(int l=0; l<g.NY; l++)
00307                    for(int j=0; j<g.NX; j++)
00308                         grid[j*g.NY+l]=g.grid[j*g.NY+l];
00309                 dx=g.dx;
00310                 dy=g.dy;
00311                 NX=g.NX;
00312                 NY=g.NY;
00313                 beginx=g.beginx;
00314                 beginy=g.beginy;
00315                 x=g.x;
00316                 y=g.y;
00317                 //if(g.outfile.is_open()) g.outfile.close();
00318                 //if(outfile.is_open()) outfile.close();
00319         }
00320         return *this;
00321 }

00324 // periodic bc in x and y : 
00325 
00326 /*
00327 double& Grid2D::operator()(int j, int l) 
00328 { 
00329         //if(l >= NY || l < 0 )
00330         //{ boundary=0.0;
00331         //  return boundary;}
00332         if (l < 0)
00333         return grid[l+NY+j*NY];
00334         else if (l >= NY)
00335             return grid[l-NY+j*NY];
00336         else if(j < 0)  
00337                 return grid[l+(NX+j)*NY];
00338         else if(j >= NX)
00339                 return grid[l+(j-NX)*NY];
00340         else
00341                 return grid[l+j*NY];
00342 }
00343 */
00344 
00345 double& Grid2D::operator()(int j, int l)
00346 {
00347        if (l < 0)
00348                return grid[l+NY+j*NY];
00349        else if (l >= NY)
00350              {
00351                if(j>0) return grid[l-NY+j*NY];
00352                else return grid[l-NY+(NX+j)*NY];
00353                }
00354        else if(j < 0)
00355                return grid[l+(NX+j)*NY];
00356        else if(j >= NX)
00357                return grid[l+(j-NX)*NY];
00358        else
00359                return grid[l+j*NY];
00360 }

00370 void Grid2D::reset()
00371 {
00372         int j,l;
00373         for(l=0; l<NY; l++)
00374                 for(j=0; j<NX; j++)
00375                         grid[j*NY+l]=0.0;       
00376 }
00377 
00378 
00379 void Grid2D::filtering()
00380 {
00381         int j,l;
00382         double a=0.5;
00383         vektor tem(NX); 
00384 
00385         for(l=0; l<NY; l++)
00386         {
00387                 for(j=0;j<NX;j++)
00388                         tem[j]=grid[j*NY+l];
00389                 for(j=1;j<NX-1;j++)
00390                         grid[j*NY+l]=(a*tem[j-1]+tem[j]+a*tem[j+1])/(1.0+2.0*a);
00391                 j=0;
00392                 grid[j*NY+l]=(a*tem[NX-1]+tem[j]+a*tem[j+1])/(1.0+2.0*a);
00393                 j=NX-1;
00394                 grid[j*NY+l]=(a*tem[j-1]+tem[j]+a*tem[0])/(1.0+2.0*a);     
00395         } 
00396 
00397 }
00398 
00399 double Grid2D::Grid2dx(double pic_pos_x, double pic_pos_y)
00400 {
00401   double g1, g2;
00402   g2=Grid2PIC(pic_pos_x+dx,pic_pos_y);
00403   g1=Grid2PIC(pic_pos_x-dx,pic_pos_y);
00404   return (g2-g1)/(2.0*dx);      
00405 }
00406 
00407 
00408 double Grid2D::Grid2dy(double pic_pos_x, double pic_pos_y)
00409 {
00410   double g1, g2;
00411   g2=Grid2PIC(pic_pos_x,pic_pos_y+dy);
00412   g1=Grid2PIC(pic_pos_x,pic_pos_y-dy);
00413   return (g2-g1)/(2.0*dy);      
00414 }
00415 
00416 
00417 void Grid2D::Pic2Grid(double pic_charge, double pic_pos_x, double pic_pos_y)
00418 {
00419         int j1,j2,l1,l2;
00420         double a1, a2, a3, a4;
00421 
00422         j1=(int)floor((pic_pos_x+0.5*(NX-1.0)*dx)/dx);
00423         j2=j1+1;
00424         l1=(int)floor((pic_pos_y+0.5*(NY-1.0)*dy)/dy); 
00425         l2=l1+1;
00426 
00427         a1=(-0.5*(NX-1.0)*dx+j2*dx-pic_pos_x)*(pic_pos_y+0.5*(NY-1.0)*dy-l1*dy);
00428         a2=(-0.5*(NX-1.0)*dx+j2*dx-pic_pos_x)*(-0.5*(NY-1.0)*dy+l2*dy-pic_pos_y);
00429         a3=(pic_pos_x+0.5*(NX-1.0)*dx-j1*dx)*(pic_pos_y+0.5*(NY-1.0)*dy-l1*dy);
00430         a4=(pic_pos_x+0.5*(NX-1.0)*dx-j1*dx)*(-0.5*(NY-1.0)*dy+l2*dy-pic_pos_y);
00431         
00432         this->operator()(j1,l1) += a2*pic_charge/pow(dx*dy,2);
00433         this->operator()(j1,l2) += a1*pic_charge/pow(dx*dy,2);
00434         this->operator()(j2,l1) += a4*pic_charge/pow(dx*dy,2);
00435         this->operator()(j2,l2) += a3*pic_charge/pow(dx*dy,2);
00436 
00437 }
00438 
00439 
00440 double Grid2D::Grid2PIC(double pic_pos_x, double pic_pos_y)
00441 {
00442         int j1,j2,l1,l2;
00443         double a1, a2, a3, a4;
00444 
00445         j1=(int)floor((pic_pos_x+0.5*(NX-1.0)*dx)/dx);
00446         j2=j1+1;
00447         l1=(int)floor((pic_pos_y+0.5*(NY-1.0)*dy)/dy); 
00448         l2=l1+1;
00449         
00450         a1=(-0.5*(NX-1.0)*dx+j2*dx-pic_pos_x)*(pic_pos_y+0.5*(NY-1.0)*dy-l1*dy);
00451         a2=(-0.5*(NX-1.0)*dx+j2*dx-pic_pos_x)*(-0.5*(NY-1.0)*dy+l2*dy-pic_pos_y);
00452         a3=(pic_pos_x+0.5*(NX-1.0)*dx-j1*dx)*(pic_pos_y+0.5*(NY-1.0)*dy-l1*dy);
00453         a4=(pic_pos_x+0.5*(NX-1.0)*dx-j1*dx)*(-0.5*(NY-1.0)*dy+l2*dy-pic_pos_y);
00454 
00455         return this->operator()(j1,l1)*a2/(dx*dy)+this->operator()(j1,l2)*a1/(dx*dy)+
00456         this->operator()(j2,l1)*a4/(dx*dy)+this->operator()(j2,l2)*a3/(dx*dy);
00457 
00458 }

00460 Grid2D& Grid2D::operator+=(const Grid2D& g)
00461 {
00462         for(int l=0; l<g.NY; l++)
00463            for(int j=0; j<g.NX; j++)
00464                 grid[j*g.NY+l]+=g.grid[j*g.NY+l];       
00465         return *this;
00466 }
00467 
00468 Grid2D& Grid2D::operator-=(const Grid2D& g)
00469 {
00470         for(int l=0; l<g.NY; l++)
00471            for(int j=0; j<g.NX; j++)
00472                 grid[j*g.NY+l]-=g.grid[j*g.NY+l];       
00473         return *this;
00474 }
00475 
00476 Grid2D& Grid2D::operator-=(double a)
00477 {
00478         for(int l=0; l<NY; l++)
00479            for(int j=0; j<NX; j++)
00480                 grid[j*NY+l]-=a;        
00481         return *this;
00482 }
00483 
00484 Grid2D& Grid2D::operator*=(double a)
00485 {
00486         for(int l=0; l<NY; l++)
00487            for(int j=0; j<NX; j++)
00488                 grid[j*NY+l]*=a;        
00489         return *this;
00490 }
00491 
00492 
00493 void Grid2D::regrid(double diffy, double begy)
00494 {
00495         vektor y_new(NY), ys(NY), tem(NY);
00496         for(int l=0; l<NY; l++) y_new[l]=begy+(0.5+l)*diffy;
00497         for(int j=0; j<NX; j++)
00498         {
00499                 for(int l=0; l<NY; l++) tem[l]=grid[l+j*NY];
00500                 spline(&ys[0],&tem[0],NY);
00501                 for(int l=0; l<NY; l++)
00502                         grid[j*NY+l]=splint(&tem[0],&ys[0],&y[0],y_new[l],NY);
00503 
00504         }
00505         for(int l=0; l<NY; l++) y[l]=y_new[l];
00506         beginy=begy;
00507         dy=diffy;
00508 }       
00509 
00510 
00511 void Grid2D::print()
00512 {
00513  if (outfile.is_open()) 
00514  {
00515   float *tem=new float[NY];
00516   for(int j=0; j<NX; j++)
00517    {
00518     for(int l=0; l<NY; l++)
00519         tem[l]=grid[l+NY*j];
00520     outfile.write((char*)tem,sizeof(float)*NY); 
00521    }
00522   outfile.flush();
00523   delete tem;
00524  }
00525 }
00526 
00527 //----------------------------r-z------------------------------
00528 
00529 double& Grid2D_rz::operator()(int j, int l) // corners not correct !!!!!
00530 { 
00531         // four corners
00532         if ( l < 0 && j < 0)
00533       return this->operator[](l+NY+abs(j)*NY);          
00534         if ( l < 0 && j >= NX)
00535       return boundary;
00536         if (l >= NY && j < 0)
00537             return this->operator[](l-NY+abs(j)*NY);
00538         if (l >= NY && j >= NX)
00539             return boundary;
00540         
00541         // boundaries
00542         if (l < 0)
00543         return this->operator[](l+NY+j*NY);
00544         else if (l >= NY)
00545             return this->operator[](l-NY+j*NY);
00546         else if(j < 0)  
00547                 return this->operator[](l+abs(j)*NY);
00548         else if(j >= NX)
00549                 return boundary;
00550         else
00551                 return this->operator[](l+j*NY);   // default
00552 }
00553 
00554 
00555 void Grid2D_rz::Pic2Grid(double pic_charge, double pic_pos_x, double pic_pos_y)
00556 {
00557         int j1,j2,l1,l2;
00558         double a1, a2, a3, a4;
00559 
00560         j1=(int)floor(pic_pos_x/dx);
00561         j2=j1+1;
00562         l1=(int)floor((pic_pos_y+0.5*(NY-1.0)*dy)/dy); 
00563         l2=l1+1;
00564   
00565         a1=(j2*dx-pic_pos_x)*(pic_pos_y+0.5*(NY-1.0)*dy-l1*dy);
00566         a2=(j2*dx-pic_pos_x)*(-0.5*(NY-1.0)*dy+l2*dy-pic_pos_y);
00567         a3=(pic_pos_x-j1*dx)*(pic_pos_y+0.5*(NY-1.0)*dy-l1*dy);
00568         a4=(pic_pos_x-j1*dx)*(-0.5*(NY-1.0)*dy+l2*dy-pic_pos_y);
00569         
00570         if(j1 == 0)
00571          {
00572                 this->operator()(j1,l1) += a2*pic_charge/(PI/3.0*pow(dx,3)*pow(dy,2));  
00573                         this->operator()(j1,l2) += a1*pic_charge/(PI/3.0*pow(dx,3)*pow(dy,2));  
00574                         this->operator()(j2,l1) += a4*pic_charge/(2.0*PI*j2*pow(dx,3)*pow(dy,2));
00575                         this->operator()(j2,l2) += a3*pic_charge/(2.0*PI*j2*pow(dx,3)*pow(dy,2));
00576          }
00577     else { 
00578            this->operator()(j1,l1) += a2*pic_charge/(2.0*PI*j1*pow(dx,3)*pow(dy,2));
00579            this->operator()(j1,l2) += a1*pic_charge/(2.0*PI*j1*pow(dx,3)*pow(dy,2));
00580            this->operator()(j2,l1) += a4*pic_charge/(2.0*PI*j2*pow(dx,3)*pow(dy,2));
00581            this->operator()(j2,l2) += a3*pic_charge/(2.0*PI*j2*pow(dx,3)*pow(dy,2));
00582      }  
00583 }
00584 
00585 
00586 double Grid2D_rz::Grid2PIC(double pic_pos_x, double pic_pos_y)
00587 {
00588         int j1,j2,l1,l2;
00589         double a1, a2, a3, a4;
00590 
00591         j1=(int)floor(pic_pos_x/dx);
00592         j2=j1+1;
00593         l1=(int)floor((pic_pos_y+0.5*(NY-1.0)*dy)/dy); 
00594         l2=l1+1;
00595                 
00596         a1=(j2*dx-pic_pos_x)*(pic_pos_y+0.5*(NY-1.0)*dy-l1*dy);
00597         a2=(j2*dx-pic_pos_x)*(-0.5*(NY-1.0)*dy+l2*dy-pic_pos_y);
00598         a3=(pic_pos_x-j1*dx)*(pic_pos_y+0.5*(NY-1.0)*dy-l1*dy);
00599         a4=(pic_pos_x-j1*dx)*(-0.5*(NY-1.0)*dy+l2*dy-pic_pos_y);
00600 
00601         return this->operator()(j1,l1)*a2/(dx*dy)+this->operator()(j1,l2)*a1/(dx*dy)+
00602         this->operator()(j2,l1)*a4/(dx*dy)+this->operator()(j2,l2)*a3/(dx*dy);
00603 
00604 }
00605 
00606 
00607 double Grid2D_rz::Grid2dr(double pic_pos_x, double pic_pos_y)
00608 {
00609   double g1, g2;
00610   g2=this->Grid2PIC(pic_pos_x+dx,pic_pos_y);
00611   g1=this->Grid2PIC(pic_pos_x-dx,pic_pos_y);
00612   return (g2-g1)/(2.0*dx);      
00613 }
00614 
00615 
00616 double Grid2D_rz::Grid2dz(double pic_pos_x, double pic_pos_y)
00617 {
00618   double g1, g2;
00619   g2=this->Grid2PIC(pic_pos_x,pic_pos_y+dy);
00620   g1=this->Grid2PIC(pic_pos_x,pic_pos_y-dy);
00621   return (g2-g1)/(2.0*dy);      
00622 }
00623

00625 
00626 //---------------------------------3D----------------------------------
00627 
00628 
00629 Grid3D::Grid3D(int NZ, double zl, double zr, Grid2D& g) : grid(NZ)
00630 {
00631  zleft=zl; zright=zr;   
00632  for(int j=0; j<NZ; j++)
00633  {
00634    grid[j]=g;
00635    grid[j].reset();
00636  }
00637  ghostl=g;
00638  ghostl.reset();
00639  ghostr=g;
00640  ghostr.reset();                 
00641 }
00642 
00643 
00644 void Grid3D::reset()
00645 {
00646  for(int j=0; j<grid.size(); j++)
00647      grid[j].reset();
00648  ghostl.reset();
00649  ghostr.reset();        
00650 }
00651 
00652 /*
00653 void Grid3D::Pic2Grid(double pic_quantity, double pic_pos_x, double pic_pos_y, double pic_pos_z)
00654 {
00655  double dist0=pic_pos_z-zleft;
00656  double dz=get_dz(); 
00657  int j0=(int)floor(dist0/dz);
00658  if (j0 < 0) return; // was j0=0;
00659  if (j0 >= grid.size() ) return; // j0=grid.size()-1; 
00660  grid[j0].Pic2Grid(pic_quantity,pic_pos_x,pic_pos_y);   
00661 }
00662 */
00663 
00664 void Grid3D::Pic2Grid(double pic_quantity, double pic_pos_x, double pic_pos_y, double pic_pos_z)
00665 {
00666  double dist0=pic_pos_z-zleft;
00667  double dz=get_dz(); 
00668  int j1=(int)floor(dist0/dz-0.5);
00669  int j2=j1+1;
00670  double f1=((j2+0.5)*dz-dist0)/dz;
00671  double f2=(dist0-(j1+0.5)*dz)/dz; 
00672 
00673  if (j1 < 0) return; // was j0=0;
00674  if (j2 >= grid.size() ) return; // j0=grid.size()-1; 
00675  
00676  if (j1==1)  {
00677     ghostl.Pic2Grid(f1*pic_quantity,pic_pos_x,pic_pos_y);       
00678         grid[j1].Pic2Grid(f2*pic_quantity,pic_pos_x,pic_pos_y); 
00679    }
00680  else if (j2 == grid.size()-1)  {
00681     ghostr.Pic2Grid(f2*pic_quantity,pic_pos_x,pic_pos_y);       
00682         grid[j2].Pic2Grid(f1*pic_quantity,pic_pos_x,pic_pos_y); 
00683    }
00684  else {  
00685   grid[j1].Pic2Grid(f1*pic_quantity,pic_pos_x,pic_pos_y);       
00686   grid[j2].Pic2Grid(f2*pic_quantity,pic_pos_x,pic_pos_y);
00687  }      
00688 }
00689 
00690 /*
00691 double Grid3D::Grid2PIC(double pic_pos_x, double pic_pos_y, double pic_pos_z)
00692 {
00693  double dist0=pic_pos_z-zleft;
00694  double dz=get_dz(); 
00695  int j0=(int)floor(dist0/dz);
00696  if (j0 < 0) return 0.0; // j0=0;
00697  if (j0 >= grid.size() ) return 0.0; //j0=grid.size()-1; 
00698  return grid[j0].Grid2PIC(pic_pos_x,pic_pos_y); 
00699 }
00700 */
00701 
00702 
00703 double Grid3D::Grid2PIC(double pic_pos_x, double pic_pos_y, double pic_pos_z)
00704 {
00705  double dist0=pic_pos_z-zleft;
00706  double dz=get_dz(); 
00707  int j1=(int)floor(dist0/dz-0.5);
00708  int j2=j1+1;
00709  double f1=((j2+0.5)*dz-dist0)/dz;
00710  double f2=(dist0-(j1+0.5)*dz)/dz; 
00711 
00712  if (j1 < 0) return 0.0; // was j0=0;
00713  if (j2 >= grid.size() ) return 0.0; // j0=grid.size()-1; 
00714  if (j1==1)  return f1*ghostl.Grid2PIC(pic_pos_x,pic_pos_y)+f2*grid[j1].Grid2PIC(pic_pos_x,pic_pos_y);
00715  if (j2 == grid.size()-1) return f2*ghostr.Grid2PIC(pic_pos_x,pic_pos_y)+f1*grid[j2].Grid2PIC(pic_pos_x,pic_pos_y);
00716  return f1*grid[j1].Grid2PIC(pic_pos_x,pic_pos_y)+f2*grid[j2].Grid2PIC(pic_pos_x,pic_pos_y);     
00717 }
00718 
00719 
00720 //-----------------Interpolation schemes--------------------------
00721 
00722 
00723 double Interpolate::twopoint(vektor& v, int j, double shift)
00724 {
00725         int bc=0; // periodic boundary conditions
00726         int n = v.size();
00727 
00728         if(fabs(shift) > 1.0) 
00729         { 
00730                 printf("shift > 1 !! j=%d  bc=%d shift=%g\n",j,bc,shift); 
00731                 exit(0);
00732         }
00733 
00734         if(shift < 0.0 && j < n-1 )
00735                 return v[j]-shift*(v[j+1]-v[j]);
00736         if(shift >= 0.0 && j > 0 )
00737                 return v[j]-shift*(v[j]-v[j-1]);
00738 
00739         if( bc == 0)  // periodic
00740         {
00741                 if( j == 0 ) 
00742                         return v[j]-shift*(v[j]-v[n-1]);   
00743                 if( j == n-1 )
00744                         return v[j]-shift*(v[0]-v[j]);
00745         }
00746 
00747         if( bc == 1)  // v=0 at boundary
00748         {
00749                 if( j == 0 ) 
00750                         return v[j]-shift*v[j];   
00751                 if( j == n-1 )
00752                         return v[j]-shift*(-v[j]);
00753         }
00754 
00755         printf("something wrong in interpolate \n");
00756         return 0.0;
00757 }
00758 
00759 
00760 double Interpolate::threepoint(vektor& v, int j, double shift)
00761 {
00762         int bc=0; // periodic boundary conditions
00763         int n = v.size();
00764 
00765         if(fabs(shift) > 1.0) 
00766         { 
00767                 printf("shift > 1 !! j=%d  bc=%d shift=%g\n",j,bc,shift); 
00768                 exit(0);
00769         }
00770 
00771         if(shift < 0.0 && j < n-2 )   
00772                 return v[j]-shift*(2.0*v[j+1]-1.5*v[j]-0.5*v[j+2])
00773                         +0.5*pow(shift,2)*(v[j+2]-2.0*v[j+1]+v[j]);
00774         if(shift >= 0.0 && j > 1 )   
00775                 return v[j]-shift*(1.5*v[j]-2.0*v[j-1]+0.5*v[j-2])
00776                         +0.5*pow(shift,2)*(v[j]-2.0*v[j-1]+v[j-2]); 
00777 
00778         if(bc == 0) // periodic 
00779         {
00780                 if( j == n-2 )
00781                         return v[j]-shift*(2.0*v[j+1]-1.5*v[j]-0.5*v[0])
00782                                 +0.5*pow(shift,2)*(v[0]-2.0*v[j+1]+v[j]);
00783                 if( j == n-1 )
00784                         return v[j]-shift*(2.0*v[0]-1.5*v[j]-0.5*v[1])
00785                                 +0.5*pow(shift,2)*(v[1]-2.0*v[0]+v[j]); 
00786                 if( j == 1 )
00787                         return v[j]-shift*(1.5*v[j]-2.0*v[j-1]+0.5*v[n-1])
00788                                 +0.5*pow(shift,2)*(v[j]-2.0*v[j-1]+v[n-1]);  
00789                 if( j == 0 )
00790                         return v[j]-shift*(1.5*v[j]-2.0*v[n-1]+0.5*v[n-2])
00791                                 +0.5*pow(shift,2)*(v[j]-2.0*v[n-1]+v[n-2]);   
00792         }
00793 
00794         if(bc == 1) // v=0 at boundary
00795         {
00796                 if( j == n-2 )
00797                         return v[j]-shift*(2.0*v[j+1]-1.5*v[j])
00798                                 +0.5*pow(shift,2)*(-2.0*v[j+1]+v[j]);
00799                 if( j == n-1 )
00800                         return v[j]-shift*(-1.5*v[j])
00801                                 +0.5*pow(shift,2)*(-2.0*v[0]); 
00802                 if( j == 1 )
00803                         return v[j]-shift*(1.5*v[j]-2.0*v[j-1])
00804                                 +0.5*pow(shift,2)*(v[j]-2.0*v[j-1]);  
00805                 if( j == 0 )
00806                         return v[j]-shift*(1.5*v[j])
00807                                 +0.5*pow(shift,2)*(v[j]);   
00808         }
00809 
00810         printf("something wrong in interpolate \n");
00811         return 0.0;
00812 }
00813 
00814 
00815 double Interpolate::fourpoint(vektor& v, int j0, double shift0)
00816 {
00817         int bc=0; // periodic boundary conditions
00818         int n = v.size(), j=j0;
00819         double shift=shift0;
00820 
00821         // reduce shift < 1, if > 1:
00822         if(fabs(shift0) >= 1.0) { 
00823                 if(shift0 > 0.0)
00824                 {
00825                         shift=shift0-floor(fabs(shift0));
00826                         j=j0-(int)floor(fabs(shift0));
00827                         if(j < 0) return 0.0;
00828                 }
00829                 else if(shift0 < 0.0)
00830                 {
00831                         shift=shift0+floor(fabs(shift0));
00832                         j=j0+(int)floor(fabs(shift0));
00833                         if(j >= n) return 0.0;
00834                 }
00835         }       
00836 
00837         if(shift < 0.0 && j < n-2 && j > 0)   
00838                 return v[j]-shift*(v[j+1]-0.5*v[j]-1.0/3.0*v[j-1]-1.0/6.0*v[j+2])
00839                         +0.5*pow(shift,2)*(v[j+1]-2.0*v[j]+v[j-1])
00840                 -pow(shift,3)/6.0*(v[j+2]-3.0*v[j+1]+3.0*v[j]-v[j-1]);    
00841         if(shift >= 0.0 && j > 1 && j < n-1 ) 
00842                 return v[j]-shift*(1.0/3.0*v[j+1]+0.5*v[j]-v[j-1]+1.0/6.0*v[j-2])
00843                         +0.5*pow(shift,2)*(v[j+1]-2.0*v[j]+v[j-1])
00844                 -pow(shift,3)/6.0*(v[j+1]-3.0*v[j]+3.0*v[j-1]-v[j-2]);
00845 
00846 
00847         if(bc == 0) // periodic 
00848         {
00849                 if(shift < 0.0 && j == n-2 )
00850                         return v[j]-shift*(v[j+1]-0.5*v[j]-1.0/3.0*v[j-1]-1.0/6.0*v[0])
00851                                 +0.5*pow(shift,2)*(v[j+1]-2.0*v[j]+v[j-1])
00852                         -pow(shift,3)/6.0*(v[0]-3.0*v[j+1]+3.0*v[j]-v[j-1]);  
00853                 if(shift < 0.0 && j == n-1 )
00854                         return v[j]-shift*(v[0]-0.5*v[j]-1.0/3.0*v[j-1]-1.0/6.0*v[1])
00855                                 +0.5*pow(shift,2)*(v[0]-2.0*v[j]+v[j-1])
00856                         -pow(shift,3)/6.0*(v[1]-3.0*v[0]+3.0*v[j]-v[j-1]);
00857                 if(shift < 0.0 && j == 0 )
00858                         return v[j]-shift*(v[j+1]-0.5*v[j]-1.0/3.0*v[n-1]-1.0/6.0*v[j+2])
00859                                 +0.5*pow(shift,2)*(v[j+1]-2.0*v[j]+v[n-1])
00860                         -pow(shift,3)/6.0*(v[j+2]-3.0*v[j+1]+3.0*v[j]-v[n-1]);    
00861                 if(shift >= 0.0 && j == 0 )        
00862                         return v[j]-shift*(1.0/3.0*v[j+1]+0.5*v[j]-v[n-1]+1.0/6.0*v[n-2])
00863                                 +0.5*pow(shift,2)*(v[j+1]-2.0*v[j]+v[n-1])
00864                         -pow(shift,3)/6.0*(v[j+1]-3.0*v[j]+3.0*v[n-1]-v[n-2]); 
00865                 if(shift >= 0.0 && j == 1 )
00866                         return v[j]-shift*(1.0/3.0*v[j+1]+0.5*v[j]-v[j-1]+1.0/6.0*v[n-1])
00867                                 +0.5*pow(shift,2)*(v[j+1]-2.0*v[j]+v[j-1])
00868                         -pow(shift,3)/6.0*(v[j+1]-3.0*v[j]+3.0*v[j-1]-v[n-1]); 
00869                 if(shift >= 0.0 && j == n-1 ) 
00870                         return v[j]-shift*(1.0/3.0*v[0]+0.5*v[j]-v[j-1]+1.0/6.0*v[j-2])
00871                                 +0.5*pow(shift,2)*(v[0]-2.0*v[j]+v[j-1])
00872                         -pow(shift,3)/6.0*(v[0]-3.0*v[j]+3.0*v[j-1]-v[j-2]); 
00873         }
00874 
00875         if(bc == 1) // v=0 at boundary
00876         {
00877                 if(shift < 0.0 && j == n-2 )
00878                         return v[j]-shift*(v[j+1]-0.5*v[j]-1.0/3.0*v[j-1])
00879                                 +0.5*pow(shift,2)*(v[j+1]-2.0*v[j]+v[j-1])
00880                         -pow(shift,3)/6.0*(-3.0*v[j+1]+3.0*v[j]-v[j-1]);  
00881                 if(shift < 0.0 && j == n-1 )
00882                         return v[j]-shift*(-0.5*v[j]-1.0/3.0*v[j-1])
00883                                 +0.5*pow(shift,2)*(-2.0*v[j]+v[j-1])
00884                         -pow(shift,3)/6.0*(3.0*v[j]-v[j-1]);
00885                 if(shift < 0.0 && j == 0 )
00886                         return v[j]-shift*(v[j+1]-0.5*v[j]-1.0/6.0*v[j+2])
00887                                 +0.5*pow(shift,2)*(v[j+1]-2.0*v[j])
00888                         -pow(shift,3)/6.0*(v[j+2]-3.0*v[j+1]+3.0*v[j]);    
00889                 if(shift >= 0.0 && j == 0 )        
00890                         return v[j]-shift*(1.0/3.0*v[j+1]+0.5*v[j])
00891                                 +0.5*pow(shift,2)*(v[j+1]-2.0*v[j])
00892                         -pow(shift,3)/6.0*(v[j+1]-3.0*v[j]); 
00893                 if(shift >= 0.0 && j == 1 )
00894                         return v[j]-shift*(1.0/3.0*v[j+1]+0.5*v[j]-v[j-1])
00895                                 +0.5*pow(shift,2)*(v[j+1]-2.0*v[j]+v[j-1])
00896                         -pow(shift,3)/6.0*(v[j+1]-3.0*v[j]+3.0*v[j-1]); 
00897                 if(shift >= 0.0 && j == n-1 ) 
00898                         return v[j]-shift*(0.5*v[j]-v[j-1]+1.0/6.0*v[j-2])
00899                                 +0.5*pow(shift,2)*(-2.0*v[j]+v[j-1])
00900                         -pow(shift,3)/6.0*(-3.0*v[j]+3.0*v[j-1]-v[j-2]); 
00901         }  
00902 
00903         printf("something wrong in interpolate \n");
00904         return 0.0;
00905 
00906 }
00907 
00908 
00909 double Interpolate::flux_balance(vektor& v, int j, double shift)
00910 {
00911         double tem1, tem2;
00912 
00913         int n = v.size();
00914 
00915         if(fabs(shift) >= 1.0) 
00916         { 
00917                 printf("flux_balance: shift > 1 !! j=%d  shift=%g\n",j,shift); 
00918                 exit(0);
00919         }
00920 
00921         if( shift >= 0.0 )
00922         {
00923                 if( j>1 && j<n-1)
00924                 {
00925                         tem2=shift*(v[j]+(v[j+1]-v[j-1])*(1.0-shift)/4.0);
00926                         tem1=shift*(v[j-1]+(v[j]-v[j-2])*(1.0-shift)/4.0);
00927                 }
00928                 else if( j==0 )
00929                 {
00930                         tem2=shift*(v[j]+(v[j+1]-v[n-1])*(1.0-shift)/4.0);
00931                         tem1=shift*(v[n-1]+(v[j]-v[n-2])*(1.0-shift)/4.0);
00932                 }
00933                 else if( j==1 )
00934                 {
00935                         tem2=shift*(v[j]+(v[j+1]-v[j-1])*(1.0-shift)/4.0);
00936                         tem1=shift*(v[j-1]+(v[j]-v[n-1])*(1.0-shift)/4.0);
00937                 }
00938                 else if( j==n-1 )
00939                 {
00940                         tem2=shift*(v[j]+(v[0]-v[j-1])*(1.0-shift)/4.0);
00941                         tem1=shift*(v[j-1]+(v[j]-v[j-2])*(1.0-shift)/4.0);
00942                 }
00943                 else
00944                 {  
00945                         printf("flux_balance: wrong j !!"); 
00946                         exit(0);
00947                 }
00948         }
00949         else if( shift < 0.0 )
00950         {
00951                 if( j>0 && j<n-2 )
00952                 {
00953                         tem2=fabs(shift)*(v[j]-(v[j+1]-v[j-1])*(1.0-fabs(shift))/4.0);
00954                         tem1=fabs(shift)*(v[j+1]-(v[j+2]-v[j])*(1.0-fabs(shift))/4.0);          
00955                 }
00956                 else if( j==0 )
00957                 {
00958                         tem2=fabs(shift)*(v[j]-(v[j+1]-v[n-1])*(1.0-fabs(shift))/4.0);
00959                         tem1=fabs(shift)*(v[j+1]-(v[j+2]-v[j])*(1.0-fabs(shift))/4.0);          
00960                 } 
00961                 else if( j==n-1 ) 
00962                 {
00963                         tem2=fabs(shift)*(v[j]-(v[0]-v[j-1])*(1.0-fabs(shift))/4.0);
00964                         tem1=fabs(shift)*(v[0]-(v[1]-v[j])*(1.0-fabs(shift))/4.0);          
00965                 }
00966                 else if( j==n-2 )
00967                 {
00968                         tem2=fabs(shift)*(v[j]-(v[j+1]-v[j-1])*(1.0-fabs(shift))/4.0);
00969                         tem1=fabs(shift)*(v[j+1]-(v[0]-v[j])*(1.0-fabs(shift))/4.0);          
00970                 }
00971                 else
00972                 {  
00973                         printf("flux_balance: wrong j !!"); 
00974                         exit(0);
00975                 }
00976 
00977         }
00978 
00979         return v[j]+tem1-tem2;
00980 
00981 }
